DOC.brief_title: The Effect Dexmedetomidine Intraocular Pressure During Robot-Assisted Laparoscopic Radical Prostatectomy
DOC.criteria: 1 . ASA class III 2. obtain write informed consent parent 3. aged 2070 year undergo robot assited laparoscopic prostatectomy 1. eye surgery prevoiusly 2. unstable angina congestive heart failure 3. concomittant eye disease ( glaucoma , diabetic retinophaty , cataract , retinal detachment ) 4. high intraocular pressure 30mmHg screen test . 5. uncontrolled hypertension ( diastolic bp > 110mmHg ) 6. bradycardia 60bpm 7 . Ventricular conduction abnormality 8. hepatic failure 9. renal failure 10. drug hyperactivity 11. neurological psychiatric illness 12. mental retardation 13. patient ` read consent form due illiterate foreigner
